Field associated with BACKVALUE.UPD field. Specifies when the back dated transactions are processed.
Accepts three values ‘ONLINE’, ‘EOD’ and ‘OFF’.
ONLINE – In ONLINE, during COB, the actual re-calculation of Valuation and Performance figure does not take place.
After running COB, user should launch the ONLINE.BACKVALUE.LAUNCH application to recalculate the values.
Note: The Performance can be re-calculated online ONLY after a COB is run and the file BV.TRANSACTIONS is updated.
EOD – During COB, processes back dated transactions and recalculate all the valuations and performance figures.
OFF – Does not consider back dated transaction for back valuation.
Value in this field will be populated in BV.SECURITY.TRANS, BV.CASH.TRANS and BV.CA.TRANS.
Validation Rules

p.p: Mandatory field, if BACKVALUE.UPD field is YES.
If this value is given, the back dated transactions are processed, as if, they were input today and there will not be any Back value effect, though BACKVALUE.UPD is set to YES.
